org.apache.james.jspf.core
Interface Mechanism

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllMechanism, AMechanism, ExistsMechanism, GenericMechanism, IncludeMechanism, IP4Mechanism, IP6Mechanism, MXMechanism, PTRMechanism
public interface Mechanism

This Interface represent a mechanismn

Method Summary
 boolean run(SPF1Data spfData)
          Run the mechanismn with the give SPF1Data
 

Method Detail

run

boolean run(SPF1Data spfData)
            throws PermErrorException,
                   TempErrorException,
                   NoneException
Run the mechanismn with the give SPF1Data

Parameters:
spfData - The SPF1Data
Returns:
true if the mechanism match. Otherwise false
Throws:
PermErrorException - Get thrown if there are any errors in modifiers
TempErrorException - Get thrown if DNS problems detected
NoneException - Get thrown if no valid records was found
